text: 2:5 Ua Me Ini 19:6; Aisaia 61:6; Malakai 1:11; Rom 12:1; Efesus 2:21-22; Hibru 13:15-16; Akar Mogomem 1:6Ezɨ ia uaghan, mati dagɨar angamɨra itiba. God ia damightɨ, ia dɨpenimɨn mɨn otoghtɨ, an Duam dɨpenir kamɨn aven ikiam. Eghtɨ God ua bagh ia mɨseveghtɨ, ia an ofa gamir gumazamizibar mɨn ikiam. Egh ia Krais Iesusɨn ziamɨn ia bar ofan mɨn uari isɨ God danɨng. Arazir kam, God bar a gifonge.
